content: I’ve told you this before, but I am on a similar path: I’m trying like hell to leave the TV news biz and get paid to write. I have a couple of writing gigs finally, and the $$ is shit, but it’s a start. Which reminds me of this: “A journey is a person in itself; no two are alike. And all plans, safeguards, policing, and coercion are fruitless. We find that after years of struggle that we do not take a trip; a trip takes us.” John Steinbeck Good luck to you!
